Name: Penumbra v1.07
Description:
REQUIRES CD2 BETA 14, MORE ENEMY VARIANTS (MEV) AND DEA. Penumbra (Previously named FCM), is the *Modified* Hazard FC (made by pH-JPEG) with various tweaks to reduce bad RNG and balance more around mission types and enemies. This tweak is done by MoonLightOri and will mainly base on the tweaks from Interstellar 4 player count and on fire comp in general. WARNING: THIS IS A SLIGHTLY TONED DOWN VERSION OF FC_B23, IT DOES NOT OFFER SIMILAR EXTREME HIGH PACING EXPERIENCE AS FC_B23.
    v1.07:
  - Rename some Elite enemies to include Elite in their name.
  - Weak Elite Slasher: 231/239/270/293 HP -> 265/274/309/336 HP (HealthMultiplier x0.3125 -> x0.3584, based on Crawler Normal Scaling at 4p.). DifficultyRating 70 -> 30 and MaxSpawnCount 1 -> 2 (Both Pool and WaveSpawner version).
  - Sentinel: DifficultyRating 60 -> 50.
  - Weak Exploder from EggSpider: Replaced with Glyphid Sentinel Swarmer (Tunnel version). 
  - Acid Spitter: AttackDamageMultiplier 0.8 -> 0.9 (still not going to kill you after Revive Health + full Shield).
  - Patrol Bot: Fix the issue where it can still bump on you (take damage and displace). Now the bump deals 0 damage. Apply freeze temperature reduction on Caretaker's Patrol Bot as well.
